mapper.select: select u.userID, u.userName, u.regID, cmm.*, cm.cafeName, cm.cafeID from cafe_members cmm left outer join cafe_master cm on cmm.cafeNo = cm.cafeNo left outer join user u on cmm.userID = u.userID where cm.cafeID=#{cafeID} and (cmm.memberType = '카페주인' or cmm.memberType = '운영자') and u.isDeleted is null and LENGTH(u.regID) > 0
